name: Aztec Number
description:
Challenge puzzle masters from all over the world
Accompanied by powerful sound effects,
solve 108 puzzles
and take possession of
the secret treasure of the Aztecs.

How to Play

Clear the stages by
tracing the blocks in the order of the numbers that are displayed on the right.

Before tracing the blocks, you can click as many times as you have MOVE
and move the blocks anywhere you want.
